summary: CNN provides breaking news, latest news, and videos covering U.S., world, weather, entertainment, politics, health, and more. The website features a wide range of topics including live updates, analysis, and multimedia content such as videos and galleries. It offers navigation to various sections like US, World, Politics, Business, Health, Entertainment, Style, Travel, Sports, Science, and Climate.

notable_features: Extensive navigation with multiple news categories
Interactive elements like quizzes and games
